author: {'steamid': '76561198040037265', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 469, 'playtime_forever': 420, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 420, 'last_played': 1642979953}
review:
[code]Puedes ver más reseñas como esta en la mentoría [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/34129733/][u]PIXEL 404[/u][/url][/code]

[h1]Un plataformas como los de antaño[/h1]
A veces, uno solo tiene ganas de disfrutar de algo que simplemente ofrezca un mínimo de divertimento, sin complicaciones y sin mundos abiertos que exigen decenas y decenas de horas para acabarlos. A veces, simplemente quieres disfrutar de un plataformas como los de antaño, y Flyhunter Origins lo consigue.

En este juego tomaremos el control de un peculiar alienígena de diminutas proporciones, el cual la ha liado y ha soltado sobre el planeta Tierra diferentes insectos que habían capturado. Y no solo eso, también ha soltado a la tripulación. No era un miembro muy destacado de la misma, sino que era el encargado de la limpieza. Así que ataviado con un minipropulsor y un cazamoscas se dirige al planeta para intentar subsanar todo el lío que ha causado.

El juego ofrece una jugabilidad muy similar a los plataformas que se podían disfrutar en la época de PS2. No esperes nada especial, ni nada sorprendente. Simplemente es un juego donde los saltos y los golpes están a la orden del día a través de 5 fases subdividas a su vez en otras tantas.

Nuestro objetivo final en cada zona será capturar a uno de los insectos que dejamos escapar accidentalmente al principio del juego, y será bastante original, presentando una especie de persecución a modo de simulación aérea de tipo arcade.

El juego se basa principalmente en el mundo animal, focalizando en entornos naturales con gran cantidad de flores, jardines y cosas similares, y los enemigos serán siempre insectos, los cuales no serán muy variados, pero sí hay algunos que están muy bien representados tales como las abejas o las mantis. 

La experiencia como tal no será muy larga, unas 5 horas o 6-7 horas si quieres conseguir todos los logros, los cuales serán bastante asequibles casi todos, aunque algunos de ellos exigirán registrar el entorno en profundidad.

Sin duda, no es un plataformas de una calidad destacable, pero hay que tener en cuenta que es realmente barato y la experiencia final es bastante satisfactoria, sobre todo si tenemos en cuenta lo poco que cuesta. Además, tiene sus notas de humor que provocan que la experiencia sea también bastante agradable.

Así que ya sabes, si simplemente quieres disfrutar de un plataformas sin pretensiones como los que había antes, Flyhunter Origins es una buena opción para pasar el rato.

author: {'steamid': '76561198001408368', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 203, 'playtime_forever': 17, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15, 'last_played': 1656053488}
review:
The first game ever released by Steel Wool, a developer now most well known for taking over the Five Nights At Freddy's franchise from one-man dev team "ScottGames"

It's a rather short, but enjoyable simple platformer that is a great one to help kids learn how to play sidescrollers. There's something here for adults as well as the colorful world, creative bug theme, and fun dialogue

If you're looking for a challenge, skip this, but if you just want to relax and look at some beautifully rendered gardens and bugs with cartoony aliens and laugh at some fun jokes, then at a four dollar price tag, this is worth an afternoon.

It's short, but at the price, you're getting a little more than you pay for.

author: {'steamid': '76561198049498441', 'num_games_owned': 5263, 'num_reviews': 448, 'playtime_forever': 168, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 168, 'last_played': 1637943110}
review:
처음 샘플컷 그래픽이 별로라고 생각했는데 게임을 하다보니 정감가는 귀여움이 있습니다.
만약 EA의 스포어의 그래픽을 나쁘게 생각하지 않으셨다면
캐릭터가 나름 귀엽다고 생각 할 수도 있는 플라이헌터 오리진입니다.

캐주얼한 플랫폼 게임으로 몇몇 군데를 제외하면 판정도 넉넉한 편이고
오히려 플레이 타임이 쓸데 없이 질질 끌지않아서 딱 좋았습니다.
하나도 안 막히고 게임을 깨신다면 2시간 30분 정도면 충분할 듯 합니다.

다만 표적들이 죄다 곤충들이라.. 곤충을 징그러워하신다면 (저도 좋아하지 않습니다)  손이 가지 않을 수 있겠네요.

가볍게 즐기기엔 나쁘지 않은 게임이었습니다.
세일하면 정말 가격이 싸지네요. 적당하게 게임하고 엔딩 보고싶다면 괜찮은 선택일 듯 합니다.
(곤충을 3D 모델링으로 보고싶다는 가정하에..)

author: {'steamid': '76561198030784015', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11207, 'playtime_forever': 108, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 108, 'last_played': 1628431479}
review:
Flyhunter Origins is a 3D rendered 2D console ported platformer where you are a small alien that has landed on Earth and you must run around and whack bugs with a flyswatter to collect eggs and stuff. 

Despite being a console port, there's 4K resolution support and the game controls work well enough with keyboard. 

This is probably one of the better 2D platformers on Steam, which isn't saying much.  The graphics are certainly a lot better than the retro pixel stuff spamming the marketplace.  Unfortunately the platforming and gameplay are very mediocre, and get tiring after just a couple of levels.   It's simply not a very engaging game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198835092050', 'num_games_owned': 155, 'num_reviews': 106, 'playtime_forever': 667, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 667, 'last_played': 1599528578}
review:
Это научно-фантастическая аркадная игра разработкой которой занимается студия, которая состоит из бывших аниматоров Pixar.
  В Flyhunter Origins вы возьмете под свое управления Зака. Он простой уборщик космического корабля, который хочет стать Флайхантером (охотником за насекомыми). Однажды, очень ценный груз экзотических насекомых, который перевозил их звездный корабль куда-то пропал по вине самого Зака и все насекомые сбежали в то время как все истинные Флайхантеры находились в крио-сне. Теперь дело за самим Заком, он должен взять на себя роль истинного охотника за насекомыми и собрать всех их обратно. Но это не самое простое дело…

author: {'steamid': '76561198010315744', 'num_games_owned': 1309, 'num_reviews': 725, 'playtime_forever': 114, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 114, 'last_played': 1595468479}
review:
Ehhh...this is one of those games that I feel more neutral on than negative.

It does have some charm and cute characters. Music isn't bad either. Graphics have that low res early 2000's look to them which is ok. Cutscenes are fine. Young kids will probably enjoy it.

The level design is kind of what breaks it for me. Overall it's kind of all over the place. Sometimes you'll think you're going in the right direction only to hit a dead end because it has a secret area, so you'll have to backtrack a bit. Things in the foreground and background kinda blend in together at times. Controls are ok but feel slightly sticky, and if you turn around there's a quick animation of the character doing that which makes it feel sluggish. You'll max out upgrades halfway through the game so that killed my desire to find them all, and with that theres no counter during the level so you won't know how many you have until you complete the level.

author: {'steamid': '76561198171339687', 'num_games_owned': 4711, 'num_reviews': 643, 'playtime_forever': 614, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 614, 'last_played': 1526910576}
review:
Attention contrôles glissants ! Un temps d’adaptation vous sera nécessaire pour apprivoiser ce platformer issu du monde mobile, dont le port aurait gagné à être plus soigné.

Vous incarnez l’agent d’entretien Zak, qui doit récupérer une cargaison d’insectes et la véritable héroïne du jeu, malencontreusement balancés dans l’espace par notre ami alors qu’il démontrait son professionnalisme. Imaginez un instant l’inversion des sexes sur ces rôles et vous avez la bienpensance sur le dos !

Ça peut sembler anecdotique mais c’est ce qui a étonné mon fils de 5 ans qui jouait avec moi sur ce titre.
On a tout de même bien rigolé à tabasser de l’insecte gratuitement, en explorant des niveaux colorés pour y retrouver les précieux œufs. Exploration ponctuée d’insupportables glitches/bugs irritants, et de phases de poursuite d’insecte volant répétées quatre fois...

On débloque des améliorations d’arme (tapette et pistolaser), ainsi que des tenues colorées pour  Zak.
Pour 4 euros, on a droit à des cartes Steam et des succès de complétion, ainsi qu’une durée de vie sympathique pour le 100% (8 heures en prenant son temps).

author: {'steamid': '76561198023779817', 'num_games_owned': 883, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 373, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 324, 'last_played': 1521464427}
review:
Das spiel  hat eine kleine gute story  mit abwechslungsreichen levels

schöne auswahl an kostüme die man sich erspielen kann

steamerrungenschaften sind alle leicht - mittel  zu erspielen

Preis für das spiel ist perfeckt gewählt wurden von den entwicklern

schade das es keine fortsetzung gibt (idee für ne fortsetzung zack ist in seinem urlaub  plötzlich kommen unbekannte spezien und entführen ihn. nach einer langen reise wacht zack auf in einer zelle die plötzlich offen ist. er ergreift die flucht bei seiner flucht begegnet er lebewesen die 20 mal kleiner sind als er. im laufe des spiel entscheidet zack sich den winzigen lebewesen zu helfen. zum ende des spiel muss zack mit hilfe der winzigen lebewesen ein neues zuhause erbauen den zack wird klar das er nicht weg kommt  aleine von diesem planeten.nach erfolgreichem aufbau erfährt zack das einzigste transtport möglichkeit seit der landung auf diesem planet zerstört wurde.)

idee endstand aus dem film Gullivers Reisen

spielablauf würde sein zb um ein gebäude fertig zu bekommen muss zack 300 steine aus level 1-5 sammeln die er wiederrum erst ab level 10 sammeln kann da zack dort eine spitzhacke bekommt (worauf ich hinaus will das man als spieler auch mal öfters die levels bespielt und nicht nur durch die levels durch saust so genannt speed run) das ganze siel sollte aber auch wiederum in die selbe spielart entwickelt werden das gebäude bauen könnte man zb genauso machen wie bei diesem spiel mit dem aufrüsten der fliegenklatsche

author: {'steamid': '76561198157201361', 'num_games_owned': 889, 'num_reviews': 795, 'playtime_forever': 120, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 120, 'last_played': 1506499599}
review:
Overall I would give this game a meh type of rating for a few reasons
1) it has a collecting premise which you collect 2 different items (biomass and eggs) however the biomass that you collect does nothing but gives "yay for you" points
2) the eggs are currancy but the upgrades are so cheap and underwhelming that I had fully upgraded myself like before halfway through the game so there was no point to collect any of it afterwords and I just ran through the levels without careing about collectables
3) you can collect different suits for your character but I finished the entire playthrough in one sitting as it isn't a very long game and the only time you can access where to change the suits is on the main menu screen
4) when starting the game the screen showing what buttons do what shows up for 5 seconds or so but then it cant be accessed via the menus (so look quick/ luckily there isn't many controls)
5) the narrorator talks alot during the first bit of the game but rarely all mid/late game which they could have used as good joke oppertunities
6) it was short

one of the highlights of the game was the music, and considering I usually dont notice the music in most games the fact I noticed it ment I liked it enough to remember it.

the movement was hesitantish feeling but playable and the visuals were decent

the game could have vastly improved itself if it had fleshed out many things like [u] Spoilers [/u][spoiler]the other crewmembers storylines, additional upgrades, upgrades unique for each crewmember, additional storyline such as what would have happened if the investors hadn't got their investment in time[/spoiler]

I flipped a coin and it was heads

Edit: I decided to change my review because looking back on my experience and the reason I had chosen to give a recommended in the first place, I decided that it should be a not recommended because you can find a game that does it much better elsewhere

author: {'steamid': '76561198192011639', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 151, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 151, 'last_played': 1504081695}
review:
Flyhunter Origins

Flyhunter Origins ist 2D Jump and Run Action Adventure was es von Handy auf den PC geschafft hat.  Die Story Der kleine Zak ist leider ein Tollpatsch und hat beim Flug durchs All seine wertvolle Ladung Insekten verloren. nun muss er auf den Planeten Erde um sie wieder einzufangen wird es Zak schaffen ?. Die Umsetzung vom Handy game auf dem PC ist sehr gelungen meiner Meinung nach. Die Grafik ist super und der Sound, das Gameplay ist Top es lässt sich sehr gut übern Xbox Controller spielen. Es macht riesigen Spaß.

author: {'steamid': '76561198262527203', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 280, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 126, 'last_played': 1497434549}
review: Приключения уборщика (важного члена команды любого корабля). Во время тренировки юного бойца и безмятежного сна остального коллектива совершила побег группа генномодифицированных подопытных животных, известных как проект "Муха". Вам предстоит высадится на планету настолько прекрасную насколько и смертоносную и произвести захват хитрого и умного противника. Играть с геймпадом.

author: {'steamid': '76561198018061433', 'num_games_owned': 1510, 'num_reviews': 1588, 'playtime_forever': 187, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'last_played': 1482792401}
review:
Spielzeit 2-3 Stunden ohne 100% zu haben


Insgesamt ist der 2,5D Plattformer mit Story recht simple aufgebaut. Das heißt die "Boss Gegner" sind alle gleich zu besiegen und es gilt immer den Levelausgang zu erreichen. Dadurch ist es ein Gelegenheitsspiel. Auch wenn man es in einem Rutsch gut und relativ schnell durchspielen kann. Die Story ist simple und passt. Was sammelbares wie neue Kleidung und "Geld" um die Waffen upzugraden gibt es auch. Im Angebot unter 1 €  schön zu spielen. Grafik ist auch niedlich gemacht. Kann man mal als Plattform Spieler mitnehmen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198156790898', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 746, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 338, 'last_played': 1454971919}

author: {'steamid': '76561198023124365', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 126, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 126, 'last_played': 1418387019}
review:
Il s'agit là d'un plate-former fortement sympathique qui nous envoie directement aux ambiances du film Fourmiz ou du jeu Zapper.
En incarnant le braconneur d'insectes qu'est Zak, la chasse aux insectes se révèle particulièrement fun et dépaysante au sein de décors variés et de musiques collant très bien à l'ambiance.
Le titre est peut-être un poil court (2 heures pour le finir) et également répétitif mais, l'ensemble de l'histoire et de son humour agréable à suivre font de ce Flyhunter Origins un jeux-vidéo tout public attractif qui en vaut le coup d'oeil, surtout vu le prix auquel il est vendu.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971741373', 'num_games_owned': 6500, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 147, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 52, 'last_played': 1439844188}
review:
Flyhunter Origins is a mobile platformer game that got released on pc.
I havent played the mobile version so I cant judge if this was a good port. 
You can change resolution, full screen/windowed mode and controls at the start of the game. This game supports a controller.

This game is aimed at the family with a younger audience as a focus.
The creators all work (or used to work) at Pixar.

In Flyhunter Origins you play Zak, a clumsy one-eyed alien, who seems to be the only survivor of an alien spacechip. Because of an incident all precious cargo has been ejected from the ship and landed on planet earth. It's your task to return it. This precious cargo is a bunch of exotic flies, hence "Flyhunter".

Armed with a Fly Swatter (later you get access to a gun) and a jetpack you have to find these flies. On your quest you'll find numerous obstacles and enemies (earth's insects). Zak is a very small alien, so earths creatures are about his size or a lot bigger. You can collect eggs you can use to upgrade your weapon stats (add +1 to damage, very basic). 
At the end of a level when you're about to catch the fly the game changes to a 3d racing game, in which you have to smack the fly a few times. Odd imo, but it works.

Its a typical platformer. Controls are easy (jump/doublejump/shoot/melee). There are plenty of spawn points. Anyone can play this.

The good
- Lovable and funny maincharacter
- Very easy controls
- Controller support
- Nicely priced
- Pixar style artwork and characters
- 3D Racing 
- Upgradable weaponry

The bad
- Hit detection seemed to be off sometimes. I had a lot of trouble defeating the big spider. Could be me though.
- Might be a bit too easy for the more mature players.
- Graphics arent really impressive

Overall a nice game for the younger audience. There are more impressive platformers around though.

Recommend? Yes, but not for everyone. 70/100
